body:
The Avicade01 server lobby is currently greifed! Just letting you guys know.

Pictures: http://imgur.com/7TNlczW,Ohmeicb
body_tagged:

title: Major issue! Help Immeditaly

replies.body: Yes that lobby has been broken.
replies.body_tagged: Yes that lobby has been broken.

replies.body: Lol get this to the top so it can get fixed!
replies.body_tagged: Lol get this to the top so it can get fixed!

replies.body: It's not that big of a deal, just don't fall down in the cracks.
replies.body_tagged: It's not that big of a deal, just don't fall down in the cracks.

replies.body: Well the hard work of the people who made the lobby will go to waste if they don't fix it.
replies.body_tagged: Well the hard work of the people who made the lobby will go to waste if they don't fix it.

replies.body: If they were going to grief something they should've done a better job.
replies.body_tagged: If they were going to grief something they should've done a better job.

replies.body: I'm sure we can copy a lobby from another Avicade server over it sometime.
replies.body_tagged: I'm sure we can copy a lobby from another Avicade server over it sometime.

reply_to.body: Well the hard work of the people who made the lobby will go to waste if they don't fix it.
reply_to.body_tagged: Well the hard work of the people who made the lobby will go to waste if they don't fix it.

replies.body: Oh nvm! When the server restarted it fixed itself!
